line: chandler i saw what you were doing through the window
chandler i saw what you were doing to my sister
listen we had a good run
i mean that is more than most people have in a lifetime
so good bye take care bye bye then
come on chandler come on i can handle ross
hey what is what is going on
well i think i think ross knows about me and monica
i thought you were my best friend this is my sister
my best friend and my sister
look we are not just messing around
so sorry that you had to find out this way
sorry but it is true i love him too
my best friend and my sister
you guys probably wanna get some hugs in too huh
awww no it is okay we have actually known for a while
you all knew and you did not tell me
well ross we were worried about you
we did not know how you were going to react
you did not know how i was going to react
what do you say we all clear out of here and let these two lovebirds get back down to business
hey hey hey i i just talking here he he is the one doing your sister
hey you know what i just realized
if you guys ever have kids
do not you think her brother should be godfather
sure if you cared enough to call it first
guys you are a few steps ahead of us
yeah big zero gravity moon steps
oh i just thought of the greatest wedding gift to get you
ooh go in on that with you
i could not think of anything
so are you ready to go
yeah i just gotta run to the bathroom
hey where are we going to lunch
how did you know i love chinese
you could fit her right in your little pocket
i mean i like her a lot and she is really nice but
in that cute little sweet way she just did
hey it is a lot harder than it looks
she she she is hurting me
i know what you need you need a bodyguard
hey ross what is ben doing after preschool
hey listen come on joey is having a problem
a little girl is beating him up
look honey i know this must be really really difficult for you and i oh sorry
i brought you some house warming gifts
salt so your life always has flavor
bread so you never go hungry
and a scented candle for the bathroom because well yknow
uh steve sarah president of the tenants committee
and this is my friend phoebe
i came to talk to you about howard
yeah he is the handy man
he is gonna be retiring next week and everyone who lives here is kicking in a 100 bucks as a thank you for all the hard work type of thing
so do you want to give a check
oh look you do not have to give it too me right now
you can slip it under my door
no no it is not that it is just i i just moved in
well the guys worked here for 25 years
yes but lived here for 25 minutes
sorry it is just never even met howard
i i mean i do not know howard
yes but too me he is just man
ugh can you believe that guy
so then president steve told everyone that i was a cheapskate and now the whole building hates me
a little kid spit on my knee
for everyone in the building and gonna sit them down and explain to them i am not a bad guy
i am not a cheap guy
just a guy who who stands up for what he believes in
look ross if you want your neighbors to like you why do not you just pay the hundred bucks
the partys gonna cost you way more than that
we are talking about my principles
okay i thought it was about your neighbors liking you
once they come to my awesome par tay
i gotta go get some nametags
and that crazy party animal will be your brother in law
very very funny but do not say things like that in front of monica
i do not want you putting any ideas in her head
umm chandler you do realize that those ideas are probably already in monicas head
well because she loves you and because you love her
yeah so what is that supposed to mean
hey chandler do not freak out
telling you something you already know
come on she broke up with richard because he did not want to have babies
and she is a woman and she is almost 30 and yknow it is monica
i do not see it that way
because i see two monicas the one that was my friend who lived across the hall and wanted to have a lot of babies and then the new monica who i just started to date
now who is to say what she wants
no you are right you are absolutely right
i mean that makes that makes everything different
it is not different at all is it
not unless different means the same
you were so funny with that waiter
yknow breadstick fangs are always funny
uhh look katie uh listen we we need to talk
i i really do i like you a lot
but sometimes when you when you playfully punch me like that it it feels like someones hitting me with a very tiny but very real bat
aww like i could hurt you
are you making fun of my size
do not make fun of me because of my size
could not you just stay like this forever
could not you just stay here forever
yeah here somewhere else yknow where where ever
yknow with the girl that seeing casually
i knew you were going to do this
get all freaked out because everybody was talking and just joking around about marriage and stuff
well you do want all that stuff right
oh and you know what i want
i do not have baby fever
oh please you are obsessed with babies and and marriage and everything that is related to babies and and marriage
got an idea why do not we turn down the heat on this pressure cooker
chandler this is not about me
this is about you and all your weird relationship commitment crap
i know the thoughts that you have in the head in your head
did you know that going out with rachel tonight instead of you
and did you know that the only baby around here is you
and did you know that i cannot even look at you right now
well i did not know that
it is gonna be okay right
i mean she is not gonna leave me
well unless you make some kind of big gesture
gunther can i get a coffee to go
still not done not wanting to talk to you
just tell me what i need to do to make things right
well that is what we do
yknow i i mess up and then you tell me how to fix it and then i do and then yknow you think all cute again
really tired of being your relationship tutor
you are gonna have to figure this one for yourself
if you are too afraid to be in a real relationship then do not be in one
oh i thought this was your party and it turns out it’s a party for howard
he is just the sweetest little man
oh and hey thanks for chipping in
i cannot believe you gave them money
i thought you agreed it was totally unreasonable that they asked me for that money
yeah but they did not ask me
this way just yknow the exotic generous stranger
that is always fun to be
yeah but you are making me look bad
if anything making you look better
they will see you talking to me and that is a hit
umm see i was thinking maybe you two could switch apartments because phoebes more our kind of people
hey listen is it obvious that wearing six sweaters
but it is not obvious why
well look i’m breaking up with katie so i had to put on some extra padding
i mean if she hits me when she is happy can you imagine how hard she is gonna hit me when i tell her taking away the joey love
did joey tell you to say that
i gotta tell ya i i i i think you are the one who is too much
ohh joey has the nicest friends
are not you gonna do something
you had better do something or gonna walk out that door right now
just give it a little time all right
so uh what did you tell them about me
oh i was telling them about you and emily
yknow try to get some sympathy
but somehow you came off as the bad guy
yeah i think i told it wrong
yknow we should talk about that because i do not totally understand what happened there
ohh this cake is really good
who would do a think like that
okay you got your free food
do not you think it is time you went home
i have something that i would like to say
of course you do not like him
he he did not give you any money he raised his own hand when i asked who hear likes ross and he is wearing two nametags
i be honest with you guys when i first met ross i did not like him at all
but then once i got to know him i saw that he is really sweet and caring and very generous
i mean all saying is do not judge ross before you get to know him all right
i mean i like all you guys now but when i first meet you yknow kurt i thought yknow abrasive drunk umm lola mind numbingly stupid
and okay you guys gold digger cradle robbing perv
so i think you all know what i mean
obviously i did not think they were gonna start throwing things
i just thought if i kept insulting everyone you would jump in and defend everyone and then you could look like the hero
see i did not get that
i need to talk to her
i need to talk to you it is urgent
okay been doing a lot of thinking about us yknow a lot of uhh us thinking
and uh well i guess there is only one one way to do this
wait what wh wh what are you doing
no no do not do not do not do it
ohhhh i cannot look at it
chandler why are you doing this
but i know not afraid to do this
do you umm you really think the best reason to get married is because you are sorry
no the best reason to get married is pregnancy
sorry is pretty much fourth yknow behind being ready and actually wanting to get married
chandler umm i want you to take just a minute and i want you to think about how ridiculous this sounds
yeah kinda wishing everyone was not here right now
do you know that none of that stuff came from me
i mean i never said i wanted to have babies and get married right now
yeah i know but i was really confused and then i talked to these guys
yknow when i said that i want you to deal with this relationship stuff all on your own
well you are not ready for that
i did not think i was
oh my god what would have done if i said yes
well i would have been happy because i would have be able to spend the rest of my life with the woman that i love
or you would have seen a chandler shaped hole in that door
hey ross will you pass me that knife
you do not have to be so mean about it
aw and i was gonna ask you to marry me because i forgot to say hello to you last week
oh no wait pheebs i think for something like that you just ask them to move in with you
okay how long is this going to go on
well i think the length of teasing is directly related to how insane you were so a long time
hey rach remember that whole we were on a break thing
well sorry will you marry me
that is not funny at all
